sourcesContent:
import {React, useState} from 'react'
import {Form, Button, Modal, Row, Col} from "react-bootstrap";

function QuestionAddModal(props) {


    return (
        <Modal
            size="lg"
            aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter"
            centered
            {...props}
        >
            <Modal.Header>
                <Modal.Title id="contained-modal-title-vcenter">
                    Thêm câu hỏi (câu {props.numberOfQuest + 1})
                </Modal.Title>
            </Modal.Header>
            <Modal.Body>
            <Row>
                    <Col md={10} sm={12} className="offset-md-1 offset-sm-0">
                        <Form>
                            <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicEmail">
                                <Form.Label>Câu hỏi</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control as="textarea" required validate="Quiz name is not valid!"/>
                            </Form.Group>
                        </Form>
                        
                    </Col>
                </Row>
            </Modal.Body>
            <Modal.Footer>
            <Button variant="outline-success" onClick={() => props.onAddQuestionSubmit([])}>Thêm</Button>
            </Modal.Footer>
        </Modal>
    )
}

export default QuestionAddModal
